rule: If the word cannot be tagged at all, the response should be "CantAnswer".
input: sentence: Visit www.example.com for more info., word: www.example.com
validityText:
The sentence "Visit www.example.com for more info." is a valid English sentence as it contains alphabets, spaces, and an allowed punctuation mark (a period). However, the word "www.example.com" is not a valid English word. It contains periods which are not allowed within a single word according to the input specification.

ERR
